name: 安娜·克拉姆斯基 Anna Chlumsky
intro: Anna Chlumsky is an American actress. She is known for her childhood role in My Girl and its sequel, as well as her supporting role in the HBO series Veep, for which she has received four consecutive nominations for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Comedy Series. She has also starred in independent films such as Blood Car and In the Loop.
birthplace: 美国,伊利诺伊州,芝加哥
